name: Youkai Festival
description:
Youkai Festival is essentially a turn-based battle simulator. Youkai have appeared and and want to fight, and what better way to get better then to be trained by the residents of Gensokyo!

This is a Touhou fangame made for the Touhou Game Jam. 

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Select Commands

Right Mouse Button - Go Back 

No sound/music, it's basically a bare bones prototype made for the jam.
